thought: To craft a detector_rail, I first need to craft redstone. To craft redstone, I need to place a redstone_block in the crafting grid. The only redstone_block is in slot 39, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
